0: RESOLUTION URGING THE MEMBERS OF THE HOUSE TO CALL UPON PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO RETAIN THE EXISTING LEGISLATED MINIMUM AGE OF CRIMINAL RESPONSIBILITY (MACR) OF CHILDREN IN CONFLICT WITH THE LAW (CICL) AND INSTEAD PROVIDE FUNDING AND RESOURCES TO BETTER THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE EXISTING LAWS

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00176
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE MEMBERS OF THE HOUSE TO CALL UPON PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO RETAIN THE EXISTING LEGISLATED MINIMUM AGE OF CRIMINAL RESPONSIBILITY (MACR) OF CHILDREN IN CONFLICT WITH THE LAW (CICL) AND INSTEAD PROVIDE FUNDING AND RESOURCES TO BETTER THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE EXISTING LAWS
